question: [Brief] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (59, 67), (110, 162), (150, 110).

qas.question: [Brief] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (59, 67), (110, 162), (150, 110).
[Practice] Dansk: Udregn areal og omkreds for trekanten med punkterne (59, 67), (110, 162), (150, 110). Provide only the area.
[Practice] Portugues: Calcule a area e o perimetro do triangulo definido por (59, 67), (110, 162), (150, 110). Provide only the perimeter.
